org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io

接口 HeapSize

  • 所有已知子接口:
    Cacheable, ExtendedCell, SizedCellScanner
    所有已知实现类:
    Append, BlockCacheKey, ByteBufferChunkKeyValue, ByteBufferExtendedCell, ByteBufferKeyOnlyKeyValue, ByteBufferKeyValue, CombinedBlockCache, Delete, HFileBlock, HFileContext, HMobStore, HRegion, HStore, InclusiveCombinedBlockCache, Increment, IndividualBytesFieldCell, KeyValue, KeyValue.KeyOnlyKeyValue, LruBlockCache, LruCachedBlock, LruCachedBlockQueue, MapReduceExtendedCell, Mutation, NoTagByteBufferChunkKeyValue, NoTagsByteBufferKeyValue, NoTagsKeyValue, Put, SizeCachedKeyValue, SizeCachedNoTagsKeyValue, WALEdit, WALSplitter.RegionEntryBuffer

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface HeapSize
    Implementations can be asked for an estimate of their size in bytes.

    Useful for sizing caches. Its a given that implementation approximations do not account for 32 vs 64 bit nor for different VM implementations.

    An Object's size is determined by the non-static data members in it, as well as the fixed Object overhead.

    For example: 

     public class SampleObject implements HeapSize {

   int [] numbers;
   int x;
 }

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      long heapSize() 

    • 方法详细资料

      • heapSize

        long heapSize()
        返回:
        Approximate 'exclusive deep size' of implementing object. Includes count of payload and hosting object sizings.
